sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import {BiBed, BiBath,BiArea} from 'react-icons/bi'; import {RiHeart2Line, RiHeart2Fill} from 'react-icons/ri'; const House = ({house}) => { const {image, type, country,address, bedrooms, bathrooms, surface, price, availableFrom} = house; const [like, setLike] = useState() const heartFill = ()=>{ setLike() } return
{type}
{country}
{address}
{bedrooms}
{bathrooms}
{surface}
{price}
Date: {availableFrom}
{ heartFill() }} className='text-lg '>{like}
}; export default House;
